com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster

Interface IServiceWithReplicatedConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IService

    public interface IServiceWithReplicatedConfiguration
extends IService
    An interface that must be implemented by any service that requires its configuration to be replicated across nodes in a cluster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getConfigurationFilePattern()
      Accessor for a string representing the configuration file pattern.
      Path getConfigurationHomeDirectory()
      Accessor for the configuration home directory.
      void reloadConfiguration()
      This operation is invoked when a configuration change has occurred.
      void setConfigurationChangeListener(IServiceConfigurationChangeListener listener)
      Invoked by the node so that it can be informed when a service configuration change occurs.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.util.service.IService

        getServiceName, setServiceName

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigurationHomeDirectory

        Path getConfigurationHomeDirectory()
        Accessor for the configuration home directory.
        Returns:
        The configuration home directory.

      • getConfigurationFilePattern

        String getConfigurationFilePattern()
        Accessor for a string representing the configuration file pattern. The format of the pattern string is a java globbing pattern. The globbing pattern is specified by the getPathMatch method.
        Returns:
        The configuration file pattern string.

      • reloadConfiguration

        void reloadConfiguration()
        This operation is invoked when a configuration change has occurred. The service must reload its configuration files and return. This operation will be invoked on a secondary node after configuration has been successfully replicated from the primary node. This operation should be executed as quickly as possible.

      • setConfigurationChangeListener

        void setConfigurationChangeListener(IServiceConfigurationChangeListener listener)
        Invoked by the node so that it can be informed when a service configuration change occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - Used to inform the node that the service configuration has changed.
